Aside.name: Jan Zdenek
Aside.quote: I create accessible, pixel-accurate frontend solutions for web and web applications.

About.title: About me
About.content:
I am an ambitious frontend developer with an eye for detail, strong analytical skills and experience in team management. I am career-driven and results-oriented, with a strong passion for making a real impact and leveraging my work.

In the past, I have had the opportunity to develop software across a wide range of environments – from companies providing custom web applications and websites to large corporations using proprietary frameworks.

When I'm not at work, I'm at school: school is the other major part of my life. As a student at Unicorn University, I have so far succeeded in courses such as Cloud Application Architecture, Frontend and Backend Systems, and Mathematical Analysis and Discrete Mathematics.

In my spare time, I spend my time developing my frontend and backend skills, playing music and video games

tabs.title: Front-end Developer • Yolk Studio
tabs.description: Implemented server-side and client-side frontend solutions, created multilingual landing pages.

tabs.title: Web-app developer • eppTec
tabs.description: Designed and developed frontend solutions for banking processes at Česká spořitelna. Using TypeScript, I translated complex requirements into functional and scalable systems.

tabs.title: Front-end Developer • ka.soft
tabs.description: Designed and developed custom web applications, creating intuitive UX/UI designs, writing responsive, performance-optimized frontend code. Managed the full development lifecycle to deliver scalable, user-focused solutions on time.
